title: cardskimming devices
extract: A method used by criminals to capture data from the magnetic stripe on the back of an ATM card. Devices used are smaller than a deck of cards and are. often fastened in close proximity to, or over the top of the ATM's factory-installed card reader.
extract_html: A method used by criminals to capture data from the magnetic stripe on the back of an ATM card. Devices used are smaller than a deck of cards and are. often fastened in close proximity to, or over the top of the ATM's factory-installed card reader.
